Comment: This is the best grooming salon I've ever been to! The staff is incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. Comment: I have been taking my dog to this groomer for a while now and I have always been impressed with the service. The groomers are skilled and patient, especially with my dog who can be quite nervous around new people. They take their time to make sure my dog looks great and never rush through the process. The prices are also very reasonable. I would definitely recommend this groomer to others!
